title: My Account has compromised by Pun
body: I don't know how to post a pic that I can show that (Pun) sent to his account

replies.body:
If your account has been compromised your first step if still possible is to change the password of the account and the associated email account.

The second recommended step is to run an anti-virus scan on your computer (if you don't have an anti-virus, we recommend Malwarebytes).

Third step is to submit an account recovery ticket to player support to verify ownership and finish securing the account: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
